data.title: Film Forum · THE 5,000 FINGERS OF DR. T
data.meta_description:
THE 5,000 FINGERS OF DR. T
11:00 AM
Sunday, January 21

URGENT TEXT 
Screenplay by Dr. Seuss

(1953) In Dr. Seuss’s wild Technicolor fantasy, a little boy is whisked to a weird land, where a cruel music teacher forces the 5,000 fingers of 500 kids to play his mile-long double decker piano. Approx. 88 min.

QUOTES
“A Seuss picture-book come to life, with fanciful soundstage sets melding perfectly with off-kilter drawn backdrops, colorful landscapes, and weird costumes.”
– Common Sense Media
